ygData.subject: Re: archery
ygData.msgSnippet: Do you think you can describe where the centaur village is coming from the bridge? Trian Soulreaper
ygData.messageBody:
Do you think you can describe where the centaur village is coming from the
bridge?


Trian Soulreaper

>
>as it turns out, there IS a place for sk to purchase bow making
>supplies. the shopkeeper of the centaur villiage in s karana sells these
>items and a bowmaking book, but not a fletching kit. all i know is that
>he is indifferent to human sk of innoruuk... also, does anybody know if
>the fletcher in feerrott is aggressive to humans?
>
>Beld Demonblade
>Fennin Ro
>
